remarks: The image of a topological space under a function is a topological space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imastps.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imastps.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imastps.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imastps.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. TopSp ) $.
imastps $p |- ( ph -> U e. TopSp ) $.
